page.title: 19HEATHER PRE-PACKS,CARNOUSTIE
page.content: Heather Pre-Packs is a{business}which began in Carnoustie in 1968 to{pack and{despatch vegetables}and{fruit}and employs about 40 people. It has grown in size and now is a large firm with a fleet of 6 lorries which are always on the move taking the products the length and breadth of the country, to places as far away as Cardiff, Bristol and London. The vegetables are{leeks, cabbage, cauliflower, {lettuce, swedes}and{potatoes}and the fruit is{raspberries}and{strawberries. This produce comes from about 60 different farms in the area. The large shed where the work is done is a hive of activity, with conveyor-belts carrying potatoes to be sorted, graded, washed and packed. Until they are transported the vegetables are taken to another shed which is kept cold to keep them fresh.
